director.name: 塔拉斯·基米奇 Taras Khymych

this_title: Legion. Chronicle of the Ukrainian Galician Army 1918-1919
trans_title: 乌克兰加利西亚军团纪事1918-1919
introduction: World War I ended. The inevitable collapse of the Austro-Hungarian Empire deepened the crisis in Europe. The Poles, Ukrainians, Czechs, Hungarians and the Nordic Slavs were preparing for the proclamation of their states' independence. On the night of November 1, 1918, the Ukrainian troops from the voluntary League of the Sich Strikers raised an uprising in Lviv and proclaimed the creation of an independent state on the Ukrainian ethnic lands.
chinese_title: 乌克兰加利西亚军团纪事1918-1919
foreign_title: Legion. Chronicle of the Ukrainian Galician Army 1918-1919
